mapper.select:
select * from zq_sync_log
to_char(create_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') like '%${createTime}%'
order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into zq_sync_log ( id, url, function_name, param, create_time, reason, way, result, code, result_desc, remark ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{functionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{way,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{result,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
